title: Tinitic
description: A series of pieces created using guitar and Max/MSP. The Max patch was set up as a DAW that would respond to the timbre and volume of incoming and outgoing signals.

title: Bygo
description: A series of pieces exploring a variety of techniques (internal DAW feedback, computer extended piano, field recordings).

title: Remixes for Exploring
description: A remix based on MEMZ’s “Six or Seven Scientists Stumble Upon A Spaceship”.
